title: Jamie Lynn Spears Releases Statement On Daughter's Hospitalization | PerezHilton.com
text:
2/06/2017 12:12 AM ET | Filed under: Jamie Lynn Spears 
In response to reports Sunday that her 8-year old daughter had suffered a serious ATV accident and was rushed to the hospital after being unconscious under water for several minutes, Jamie Lynn Spears just released the following statement: 
​"The details the media are reporting surrounding the incident regarding Jamie Lynn's daughter Maddie are incorrect. Right now the Spears family asks that everyone respect their privacy during this time and appreciates all the prayers and support for their family." 
The family deliberately is not informing the public about Maddie's current condition. We continue to pray for her until they give us another update! Best Dressed Celebs Of The Week!
